Question: In the last phase of his career, this person adopted many techniques to achieve these effects.
Hints: This person died on 23 April 1616 and was survived by his wife and two daughters.
The actors in this person's company included the famous Richard Burbage, William Kempe, Henry Condell and John Heminges.
In ****'s late romances, he deliberately returned to a more artificial style, which emphasised the illusion of theatre.
